name: postgrest-docker
description: Basic example of initialising ```PostGres``` ```pgAdmin```, ```PostgREST``` and ```Swagger``` with docker compose on ubuntu.

scripts.patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.start: pm2 start webhook/ecosystem.config.js && npm run restart
scripts.restart: docker compose down && docker compose up -d --build
scripts.stop: docker compose down -v && pm2 stop webhook/ecosystem.config.js
scripts.flush: docker compose down && docker volume prune
scripts.dev:restart: docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up -d --build
